original_text: While those two men were leaving, some people brought another man to Jesus. This man could not speak because of a bad spirit in him.
korean_text: 그들이 나갈 때에 귀신 들려 말 못하는 사람을 예수께 데려오니

sentences.original_text: While those two men were leaving
some people brought another man to Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들이 다른 한 사람을 예수님께 데려왔습니다
이 사람은 말을 할 수 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: because of a bad spirit in him
sentences.korean_translation: 그 안에 있는 악한 영 때문에
